summary: This bill proposes to rename the Department of Veterans Affairs multispecialty clinic in Marietta, Georgia, as the "Colonel Michael H. Boyce Department of Veterans Affairs Multispecialty Clinic." The bill includes a detailed account of Colonel Boyce's military service and his post-military contributions to the community, highlighting his work with veterans and his role as chairman of the Cobb County Board of Commissioners. It also officially designates the current clinic's address and specifies how future references to the clinic will be handled.
